item.title: Comparing options for parametrized testing in javascript
item.description: We explore how to use parametrized tests (example in java, example in c#) The tests are written using mocha syntax: describe, it. Using chai for expectations: assert. Note: the example used below (adding to an array) is simple enough to be understood by everybody, without having to explain the domain. The real tests can have a more complicated environment or domain. This is just an example. Using a custom syntax This is just an example of some possible syntax, not using any (currently) existing framework.
